=API for ns-utils=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.ns-utils))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_dir_nsname) dir] [#(_docs_nsname) docs] [#(_get-ns_ns-sym) get-ns] [#(_ns-vars_ns) ns-vars] [#(_print-dir_ns) print-dir] [#(_print-docs_ns) print-docs] [#(_vars_nsname) vars] 

----
===(_dir_ nsname)===
====Macro====
Prints a sorted directory of public vars in a namespace
----
===(_docs_ nsname)===
====Macro====
Prints documentation for the public vars in a namespace
----
===(_get-ns_ ns-sym)===
Returns the namespace named by ns-sym or throws if the
namespace does not exist
----
===(_ns-vars_ ns)===
Returns a sorted seq of symbols naming public vars in
a namespace
----
===(_print-dir_ ns)===
Prints a sorted directory of public vars in a namespace
----
===(_print-docs_ ns)===
Prints documentation for the public vars in a namespace
----
===(_vars_ nsname)===
====Macro====
Returns a sorted seq of symbols naming public vars in
